attributes.action: Stop the Violence in Middle East
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The ancient cities of the Middle East have been utterly destroyed by violence and terrorism. We musn't just burn all the remnants of the the origins of our faiths. Should we? I urge everyone with a bit of respect for their faiths and humanity to strenghthen my petition. Please.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Desist/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
